snippet: The success of Israel’s Iron Dome antirocket missile system has had an impact on the recent outbreak of hostilities with the Palestinians.
abstract: Cross-border fighting between Israel and Palestinian militant groups in Gaza continues for fourth day; Palestinian death toll is rising from Israeli airstrikes and the militants' rockets reach farther into Israel; neither Israel nor Hamas, Islamic militant group that rules Gaza, give sign they want an all-out confrontation. Photos (M)

byline.original: By ISABEL KERSHNER and FARES AKRAM

lead_paragraph: The success of Israel’s Iron Dome antirocket missile system has had an impact on the recent outbreak of hostilities with the Palestinians.

headline.main: In Gaza, New Conditions Shape Old Fight
